activities:
Customers and prospective customers use on-line forms to provide contact information in connection with marketing and sales activities. Limelight Networks uses the information collected to operate, maintain, enhance, and provide all of the features and services of its service offerings, as well for administrative purposes to improve its marketing and customer service activities.

Limelight Networks also receives and processes HR data containing personally identifiable information of employees and prospective employees. Information submitted to Limelight Networks is used for employment and labor purposes, including evaluation of qualifications for employment, employee benefits and workforce management, legal and corporate enforcement and compliance, reporting, security management, administration of compensation, performance management and training, budgeting and salary administration, business contact directory, and company network access and authentication.

This data, including personal data, is collected and processed primarily in the U.S. in accordance with Limelight's privacy policy pertaining to such data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
